original_text: Who concerning the truth have erred, saying that the resurrection is past already; and overthrow the faith of some.
korean_text: 진리에 관하여는 그들이 그릇되었도다 부활이 이미 지나갔다 함으로 어떤 사람들의 믿음을 무너뜨리느니라

sentences.original_text: Who concerning the truth have erred
saying that resurrection is past already
and overthrow the faith of some
